title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document the requirements for the LowLevelProgrammingTutor platform, including the target audience, programming languages and concepts to cover, desired features, and learning objectives.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture for the platform, including the frontend, backend, database, and any necessary integrations or third-party services.

title: Develop User Interface
description: Design and implement the user interface for the platform, including the learning modules, coding environments, and any additional features.

title: Implement Backend and Database
description: Develop the backend services and database for the platform, including user authentication, progress tracking, and any other necessary functionality.

title: Integrate Learning Content
description: Develop or integrate the learning content for low-level programming concepts, including assembly language and memory management.

title: Implement Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Develop and implement a testing strategy for the platform, including unit tests, integration tests, and user acceptance testing.

title: Deploy and Maintain Platform
description: Set up the infrastructure and deployment processes for the platform, including continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipelines.

title: Implement Security Measures
description: Ensure the platform adheres to best practices for security, including user authentication, data encryption, and protection against common vulnerabilities.
